3_1AZjDLkfYwSmjM7ZJUf7HHnrF778augRMa.body: From the names you listed, "The Underworld Tales," "Arcane Maelstrom" and "The Doomed Scrolls" sound interesting. The rest are not so good names, in my opinion. As an outsider, with no knowledge of what your game is about, its hard to give any good name to it. Should focus on making your game first and then converge to a name that best describes it.
